original_title: Axar is like a big brother ... Delhi Capitals will win trophy this year: Porel
original_summary: Delhi Capitals have overhauled their team for the upcoming 2025 IPL season with Axar Patel as the new captain. Wicketkeeper Abishek Porel expresses confidence that Patel's leadership will end the franchise's title drought, highlighting his deep understanding of the team and supportive off-field presence. Porel, who was retained by the franchise, highlighted Axar's deep understanding of the team, having spent six years with the Delhi outfit. Axar has been a part of the Delhi Capitals setup since 2019 and has become a crucial player in India's white-ball set-up too.

original_title: IPL 2025: KKR Team Preview – SWOT Analysis and Best XI
original_summary: Kolkata Knight Riders aim to secure their fourth IPL title with Ajinkya Rahane as the new captain. Retaining key players like Sunil Narine and Andre Russell, and adding talents such as Quinton de Kock and Anrich Nortje, KKR have a balanced squad. Despite a few weaknesses, their mix of experience and new additions positions them well for a successful season.
